attributes.action: Evacuate innocent civilians of Aleppo urgently before it's too late
attributes.additional_details: We all know what's happening in Aleppo. Women and children have been targeted. There are still 50,000 civilians trapped inside Aleppo. We urgently have to do something to provide them safe exit
attributes.background: Five years into the civil war, Syria has turned into the greatest humanitarian catastrophe of our time. All red lines have been crossed.
